member.name: M:WebApi.Areas.HelpPage.ApiDescriptionExtensions.GetFriendlyId(System.Web.Http.Description.ApiDescription)
member.summary: Generates an URI-friendly ID for the . E.g. "Get-Values-id_name" instead of "GetValues/{id}?name={name}"
member.returns: The ID as a string.

member.name: T:WebApi.Areas.HelpPage.HelpPageConfig
member.summary: Use this class to customize the Help Page. For example you can set a custom to supply the documentation or you can provide the samples for the requests/responses.

members.member:
The controller that will handle requests for the help page.
[FilterIP( ConfigurationKeyAllowedSingleIPs = "AllowedAdminSingleIPs", ConfigurationKeyAllowedMaskedIPs = "AllowedAdminMaskedIPs", ConfigurationKeyDeniedSingleIPs = "DeniedAdminSingleIPs", ConfigurationKeyDeniedMaskedIPs = "DeniedAdminMaskedIPs" )]

member.summary: Gets the objects that are used directly as samples for certain actions.

member.summary: Gets the objects that are serialized as samples by the supported formatters.

member.name: P:WebApi.Areas.HelpPage.HelpPageSampleGenerator.SampleObjectFactories
member.summary: Gets factories for the objects that the supported formatters will serialize as samples. Processed in order, stopping when the factory successfully returns a non- object.
member.remarks: Collection includes just initially. Use SampleObjectFactories.Insert(0, func) to provide an override and SampleObjectFactories.Add(func) to provide a fallback.

member.name: T:WebApi.Areas.HelpPage.ObjectGenerator
member.summary: This class will create an object of a given type and populate it with sample data.

member.name: M:WebApi.Areas.HelpPage.ObjectGenerator.GenerateObject(System.Type)
member.summary: Generates an object for a given type. The type needs to be public, have a public default constructor and settable public properties/fields. Currently it supports the following types: Simple types: , , , , , etc. Complex types: POCO types. Nullables: . Arrays: arrays of simple types or complex types. Key value pairs: Tuples: , , etc Dictionaries: or anything deriving from . Collections: , , , , , or anything deriving from or . Queryables: , .
member.returns: An object of the given type.

member.summary: Indicates whether the sample is used for request or response

member.name: T:WebApi.Controllers.EmailController
member.summary: Sending user selected favourites resources list to a email account.

member.name: M:WebApi.Controllers.EmailController.Send(BIZ.EmailMe.email)
member.summary: Sending user selected favourites resources from KHP's public SMTP. the email receiver should do email account format validation before sending
member.param:
user's email account and his favourites resources list. Using "，" (comma) to separate each receivers if you have multiple receivers.
            JSON format. 
            {"lang":"en","receiver":"user1@example.com; user2@example.com;", "body":"my favourites resources list:
 1. Kids help phone; 2. Ontario Mental Health services."}
member.returns: successful sent return "OK", otherwise will say "Failed"

member.name: M:WebApi.Controllers.EmailController.Gsender(BIZ.EmailMe.email)
member.summary: Test sending email by using Gmail public SMTP. the email receiver should do email account format validation before sending
member.param:
user's email account and his favourites resources list. Using ", " (comma) to separate each receivers if you have multiple receivers.
            JSON format. 
            {"receiver":"user1@example.com; user2@example.com;", "body":"my favourites resources list:
 1. Kids help phone; 2. Ontario Mental Health services."}
member.returns: successful sent return "OK", otherwise will say "Failed"
